:orphan:

Rule Community Services
=======================


**Rule Community** is a Community including multiple microservices to serve Rakizo 
platform. The microservices are treated as cloud function. Rakizo is using GCP platform.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
   test

.. uml:: 
   
   create_rule.puml
   update_rule.puml
